title: TS Eliot - The Cow Boys
desc: We are the cow boys, the cattle boys, boots filled with snakes

panels.alt: A cowboy riding left to right, smoking. The sun is up and there are birds in the sky
panels.text:
This is the way 
 the bronco bucks
panels.hovertext: Between the cowboy and the horse falls the shadow

panels.alt: A cowboy riding right to left, smoking. The moon is up and there are stars in the sky
panels.text:
not with a toot 
 but a yee haw
panels.hovertext: Between the cowboy and the horse falls the shadow
